name: RoR-RulerOfRegions
description:
General Idea

In the game, players try to capture areas on the map with their own troops. They

destroy their enemies with quick strategic moves. The player who destroys all

enemies in a level successfully completes that level. Each player has a certain

number of troops to start with. Players select a certain number of troops and send

them to the area they want to capture. They regularly gain new troops in captured

territories and in their starting zone at regular intervals.

Story

The time has changed in the Aegean sea. Big countries stopped their claims and

support on the islands. From that time, local people need to found a way to keep

themselves alive. As a result of this, islands started to create their own countries.

Because of the limited area, these countries had very limited resources on these

islands. That's why each folk wanted to live in better conditions. After some time,

these desires resulted as a military investment. Warships started to build and island

wars take place in the Aegean sea.
